title: Topic 006 Question 032
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains two instances of SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines named VM1 and VM2. Both instances run Microsoft SQL Server 2019 CU8.
You need to deploy a failover cluster instance (FCI) to VM1 and VM2 that will use Azure shared disks. The solution must maximize resiliency.
Which quorum option should you use?
options: node majority with a cloud witness
node majority with a file share witness
node majority with a disk witness
